item.description:
What:
Mass. Oath Keeper Meeting

When:
Sunday April 25th, 4pm-7pm

Where:
VFW
17 Fitchburg Street
Marlborough Mass.

Agenda:
-Meet and Greet new members
-Update from National Board
-General Discussion

Note:
This invitation has been extended to OathKeeper Members from Connecticut and Rhode Island. Please feel free to bring friends, family member, and any person who has an interest in learning more about the Oath Keeper organization.

Contact;
Any questions feel free to call (978) 897-7446 or email: massokrep@yahoo.com

official event link:
http://oathkeepers.ni...

More info on Oath Keepers:
http://oathkeepers.or...

Directions from Rte. 495:
Exit 25A towards Rt. 85/Hudson
Bear right onto Fitchburg Street
VFW .07 miles on left
item.name: Mass. Oath Keeper Meeting
